Comment: Increments number under cursor - use Ctrl on linux and Alt on windows
Decrements number under cursor - use Ctrl on linux and Alt on windows
Removes all trailing spaces - unarranges columns
Sort lines n to m by column c - ! for reverse sorting - unarrange before sorting
Delete from cursor till end of line
Switches case of marked letters to uppercase
Switches case of marked letters to lowercase
Toggles case of letter under cursor
Opens http://dict.leo.org for the current word under the cursor
Opens the file / url under the cursor
Set the current shown directory in Fileexplorer as working directory
Opens the file / url under the cursor in the fileexplorer
Formats the highlighted section e.g. ggvG= to format the whole file
Shows the current status of the working tree
Commits the status of the working tree
Show diff of current file (:on first) - or type dv in status window on file
Go back after moving to tag
Shows the help to a shortcut with CTRL
Disables highlighting e.g. after a search
Sets focus to window dependening on the arrow key
increase current window height N lines
decrease current window height N lines
